 2024-04872024-05-09NR
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
PrecisReappointment of D. STANLEY THOMPSON of Springwater, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Management of the Canada Revenue Agency, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
